Texts.Chs: 将一个^orange;Radien纪念品^reset;带给^green;Radien商店^reset; (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring a ^orange;Radien Relic^reset; to the ^green;Radien Shop^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Can it truly be? A ^green;Vexinarri Glaff^reset;? Where did you find this?!?! I thought these were only a legend! As promised, your reward. It has been a pleasure.

I am what you might call a collector, of sorts. My people have little knowledge of our past, and I make it my mission to find more information about our history. If you find a ^orange;Radien Relic^reset;, could you bring it back to me? I'd be ever so thankful.
